title: These Chains That Bind
description: Juliet Harrison can whip up one mean protection spell; Ezra Jacobs can snipe a man from a mile away. They might just be Columbus' best detective duo... if only they'd stop arguing.What do FBI agents, a bad-ass ex-marine, and a Mob Errand Boy have in common?They're all after one very annoyed Juliet Harrison.Add to that a friend with an unrelenting ghost problem and a dangerous necromancer on the loose, and Juliet may not survive long enough to help the one person she can't live without.
author: K.T. Swartz
